summary: 14 New map Markers to speed up travel around Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
A mod that adds 14 new map markers to save time travelling around Skyrim at the following locations;

All player Homes (Breezehome, Vlindrel Hall, Proudspire Manor, Honeyside and Hjerim)
Jorrvaskr Home of the Companions
Castle Dour in Solitude
The Dark Brotherhood Dawnstar Sanctuary Secret Exit (When Bought)
Cidhna Mine
Solitude Docks
Windhelm Docks
College of Winterhold; Arch Mage\'s Quarters
The Skyforge
Dragon Priest Shrine (Bromjunaar)

Steam Workshop link (Over 7000 unique downloads!): http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=8272&searchtext=
author: Benpire
